Typography And Automation

was a FHP Workshop I gave about writing JavaScript for InDesign.

The aim was to learn the basics of scripting to use them in design processes. It was amazing to see what the students came up with within 2 weeks. From their questions I combined a wiki about extendscript on github.com. Below you see some of the results created by the scripts from the wiki.
If you want to see the full project. It is published on github.com and under several open source licenses.

This site is generated with gh-pages, jekyll and twitter bootstrap by fabiantheblind.
Get the source files over here. Oh. I almost forgot that boring legal stuff called impressum.
